content: I think I'll start with a simple honey and oatmeal soap recipe. I've heard oatmeal is great for soothing itchy skin, and I have some rolled oats at home that I can use. I'll definitely keep those tips in mind when making the soap. By the way, I was thinking of selling my soaps and lotions at the Night Market, do you think I should have a business card or a flyer to promote my products?
